command: sudo iptables -A INPUT -p icmp --icmp-type echo-request -m string --algo bm --hex-string "|DEADBEEF|" -m recent --name T1205_ICMP --set -j LOG --log-prefix "T1205_ICMP_SIG "
explanation: Detects ICMP echo-requests carrying a magic token (0xDEADBEEF) as a covert activation marker, consistent with T1205 signaling via ICMP payloads.
rationale_steps: Scan ICMP payloads for a specific hex signature acting as a magic token.
Track sources and log occurrences to flag covert ICMP control signals.
